title: Visua
shortDescription: A Social Media Platform let users share their physical activity data such as steps and distance, and compete with friends in challenges. Also to track their activity and set goals.

title: Voice Command VSCode extension
shortDescription: VSCode extension that allows users to control the editor using voice commands. Users can open and close files, navigate through the code, and run command.

title: 3rd Place - Hackathon
shortDescription: A Challnge to create a web application that handle API data and display it in a creative way.

title: AirBnB Clone
shortDescription: A clone of the Airbnb website, where users can search for properties, view details

title: Live news website
shortDescription: A news website that fetches data from MediaStack and displays it in a user-friendly way.
